summary: The module supplies a comprehensive set of sample objects and helper utilities used to exercise Django serializers across every supported field type and relationship, including forward, backward, and self‑referencing links. It dynamically builds a test case that creates, compares, and validates data for a wide range of model configurations.
business_intent: Provide a reusable foundation for serializer testing that guarantees all model field variations and relational scenarios are correctly serialized and deserialized, helping developers detect regressions and ensure data integrity.
